results.definition: act of getting or draining something such as electricity or a liquid from a source
examples: the drawing of water from the well

results.definition: players buy (or are given) chances and prizes are distributed by casting lots
the act of moving a load by drawing or pulling
the creation of artistic pictures or diagrams
examples: he learned drawing from his father

results.definition: an illustration that is drawn by hand and published in a book, magazine, or newspaper
examples: it is shown by the drawing in Fig. 7

results.definition: a representation of forms or objects on a surface by means of lines
examples: he did complicated pen-and-ink drawings like medieval miniatures
